title: Picasso Painting Breaks Record For Most Expensive Artwork Sold At Auction
teaser: One of Pablo Picasso's later paintings in his series, "Les Femmes D'Alger" ("Women of Algiers"), was sold for $179.4 million, including the Christie's Auction House fee, at auction on Monday night.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
